modName: Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation - no Temptress Race - Heavy
summary: Adds Heavy version of the Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation - no Temptress race
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=#db7900]Description[/color][/b][/size]
Adds Heavy Armor versions of the armours provided by Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation.
The appearance is exactly the same as the original ones, while the stats are modified according to the Crafting Group of every set.

Example: 
Dandelion is related to Orcish, thus armor rating and weight are more or less what you\'d expect of a Orcish armor set.

[size=5][b][color=#db7900]Prerequisites[/color][/b][/size]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation[/url]

[size=5][b][color=#db7900]Installation[/color][/b][/size]
Place the ESP file in your Data folder, or use the Nexus Mod Manager.
Load it after Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation

[size=5][b][color=#db7900]Changelog[/color][/b][/size]
20120919 - v0.2: add Vicky\'s
20120919 - v0.1: Dandelion set only
author: trumbitta
